0 Param data.1 string m_description: Attack while dashing. Perform a basic attack while attacking to execute a follow-up. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Power increases when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Move back and unleash a shock wave with your Daemon. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Shock wave pierces when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Perform a cross-slash attack. Hold down the button before triggering to charge and increase the power. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Charge time is shorter when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Jump and slash upward, launching the enemy to be struck by your Daemon. Perform a basic attack to execute a follow-up. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Critical hit chance increases when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Withdraw as your Daemon advances, shielding you and performing a series of attacks. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Number of attacks increases when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Perform a side sweep in coordination with your Daemon, who attacks from above. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Can Pierce Defense when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Stab the enemy. While stabbed, holding down the button causes your Daemon to repeatedly attack. Attacks that hit heal you. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Healing increases when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Attack in unison with your Daemon. Power increases based on number of basic attacks dealt. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Invulnerable while attacking when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Jump to attack from above. Press the button again as you hit to guarantee a critical hit. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Critical power increases when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Focus thoughts and charge at the enemy. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Can overwhelm Defending enemies and pierce Defense when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Perform a high critical hit chance attack from behind a spear wall that keeps enemies away and deflects shots. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Wall damages when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Strike at your enemies as your Daemon attacks from above. Chance to Stagger. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Critical hit chance increases when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Lunge forward as your Daemon flies into the air. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Restores HP when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Attack by throwing your Daemon, piercing enemies hit. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Power increases when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Perform a furious, lightning-quick attack born of the bond with your Daemon. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Number of hits increases when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Send your Daemon crashing down from above. Power increases based on the number of critical hits. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Critical power increases when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Your Daemon performs a daring charge at the enemy. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Attack increases when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Deal a deadly slash at the enemy as your Daemon launches it into the air. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Power increases when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Your Daemon performs a series of attacks while spinning. Pulls in enemies. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Critical hit chance increases when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Dash up to an enemy and attack, dealing a devastating blow to Defending enemies. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Can Pierce Defense when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Perform a reckless attack with your Daemon. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Hold down to continue attacking when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
An attack that knocks back, with a small chance to trigger with more power. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Critical power increases when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Strike the ground with your axe, shaking the ground. Always overwhelms Defending enemies. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Area of effect increases when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Unleash a beam of light that cuts through enemies. Power increases based on the total time charged. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Always Staggers the enemy when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Attack back-to-back with your Daemon. Side and rear hits increase power. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Chance to Poison when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Attack in tandem with your Daemon. Become Invisible after attacking. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Higher critical hit chance when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Unleash a forward shock wave, followed immediately by a shock wave from your Daemon. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Become Invisible when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Slash forward in an attack that sends your Daemon flying into the air. Side and rear hits have a chance to Poison. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Power increases when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Unleash a soul-harvesting blow. Side and rear hits can instantly kill. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Higher chance of instant kill when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Strike the ground with your scythe. Your Daemon attacks enemies near the spot struck. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Daemon attacks a larger area when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Hack at the enemy in tandem with your Daemon. Side and rear hits have a higher critical hit chance. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Number of hits increases when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Unleash a soul-cleansing assault. Power increases based on number of side and rear hits. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Pins adjacent enemies when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Dash forward with your Daemon, dealing a series of strikes. Chance to Paralyze. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Number of hits increases when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Move through the air and attack in tandem with your Daemon. Increased power against enemies taking an action. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Higher critical hit chance when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Fall back as your Daemon unleashes a vicious attack. Chance to Paralyze. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Chance to Poison when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Negate enemy attack and counter. Attacks while enemy is taking an action reflect the enemy attack. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Always Staggers the enemy when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Strike enemy in a pincer attack. Attacks while enemy is taking an action are always critical hits. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Critical power increases when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Knock enemy skyward. Attacks while enemy is acting have a chance to Poison. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Power increases when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Conceal yourself and sneak attack. Become invisible and cause attacks while enemy is taking an action to Pierce Defense. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Chance to Paralyze when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Hold down to perform a series of reckless attacks. Power increases based on number of attacks while enemies are acting. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Restores HP when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Fire a massive shot in tandem with your Daemon. Higher critical hit chance when locked on to enemies. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Pins enemy momentarily when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Fall back while your Daemon attacks. Chance to Stagger. Cannot lock on. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Decreases the Defense of enemies while Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Fire a full volley in all directions. Can lock on to multiple targets, and increases power toward those enemies. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Higher critical hit chance when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Fire a volley of shots with your Daemon, focusing on speed over accuracy. Shots converge on locked on enemies. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>More focused when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Fire a variable number of shots. Can lock on to multiple targets, and deals more hits when locked on. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Lower shot variability when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Knock the enemy skyward and fire a volley of shots. Hold down button to increase number of hits. Cannot lock on. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Power increases when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Fire a volley of homing shots. Shots converge on locked on enemies. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Chance to Stagger when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Shots rain down like meteors. Power increases based on number of locked targets. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Number of hits increases when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Attack while charging forward behind a shield of your Daemon's might. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Restores HP when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Perform a projectile attack with an exploding shot. Hold button before triggering to increase power. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Charge time is shorter when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Your Daemon becomes an advancing shield, damaging enemies it touches and absorbing shots. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Deals more damage when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Bombard the ground, knocking enemies skyward and striking them with the weight of the shieldcannon. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Power increases when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Fire a projectile laser attack while spinning back-to-back with your Daemon. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Number of hits increases when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Perform a pincer attack with your Daemon, crushing the enemy. Decreases Attack and Defense. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>The effect is enhanced when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Perform a projectile laser attack that deals multiple hits. Hold the button to increase the duration. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Higher critical hit chance when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Create a field of annihilation. Deals more damage based on number of shield blocks. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>All stats increase within the field when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Channel the power of your Daemon into an attack. Spawns a device. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Piercing effect boosted when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Unleash a flurry of attacks interwoven with your Daemon. Power increases based on number of devices. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Number of hits increases when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Unleash a kick with the wrath of your Daemon. Pierces more Defense based on the number of devices. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Can spawn devices when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Send out a shock wave with your Daemon. Number of hits increases based on number of devices. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Higher critical hit chance when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Unleash an attack of stored energy. Chance to increase Attack that increases with more devices. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Restores HP when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Knock the enemy skyward and smash them down to the ground. The more devices spawned, the higher the chance to Stagger. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Increases Defense when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Unleash a flawless series of honed attacks. Critical hit chance increases based on devices spawned. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Critical power increases when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Emit a blast of primeval light. Power and number of hits are based on current devices and total spawned. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Power increases when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Attack with your Daemon and a chain. Marks enemies hit. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Area of effect larger when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Fling chains in all directions. Chance to Muddle. Increased power on marked enemies. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Higher chance to Muddle when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
An attack that drains life. Marked enemies restore more HP. Hold down button to increase number of hits.  <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Can Pierce Defense when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Take to the air and send your chain flying. Chance to mark enemies hit. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Power increases when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Fire an electromagnetic shot. Chance to Paralyze. Always critically hits marked enemies. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Critical power increases when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Binds all manner of things. Chance to Stun. Marks enemies hit. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Reduced delay after triggering when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Lash out with your chain in a dance with your Daemon. Chance to debuff marked enemies. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Higher critical hit chance when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Fling your chain around wildly. Power increases based on total marked targets. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Always Staggers when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Rush forward and attack. Use while moving to increase critical hit chance. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Area of effect larger when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Send a shock wave from your tail. Press button again while attacking to execute a follow-up. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Power increases when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Howl and attack in all directions. Increases Attack and Defense. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>The effect is enhanced when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Execute a well-timed sneak attack. Use while moving to increase power. Chance to Muddle. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Chance to Poison when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Pull in enemies and unleash a blow from above. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Force of pull and number of hits increases when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Perform a series of blindingly quick attacks in perfect harmony with your Daemon. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Higher critical hit chance when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Focus your power and unleash a breath attack. Chance to Stun that increases if performed while moving. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Stun duration increases when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>
Harness the power of nature to rush the enemy. Power increases based on total distance traveled. <SKL_EFF_HIDE>Restores HP when Manifested.</SKL_EFF_HIDE>

Increase the Affinity gained when attacks hit.
Increase the power of skills used immediately after a basic attack hits.
Chance to recover HP when attacks hit.
Increase critical hit chance of attacks used to cancel the delay after taking an action.
Increase Affinity gained when taking an attack.
Increase Affinity when you defeat an enemy.
Evade for longer when dashing.
Gain more Attack the longer you haven't taken damage.
Increase Affinity gained when you use Healing Incense.
Increase the power of attacks triggered by canceling the delay after taking an action. The higher your Affinity, the greater the effect.
Gain increased critical power the higher your Affinity.
Gain more skill power with higher Affinity.
Attacks pierce Defense when Affinity is over 150.
Chance to negate attacks taken when your Affinity is over 150.
Increase movement speed. Only applies when Manifested.
Increase critical hit chance. Only applies when Manifested.
When Affinity increases, increase Attack instead. Only applies when Manifested.
Decrease enemy Defense when attacks hit. Only applies when Manifested. Can Stack.
Chance to instantly kill when attack hits. Only applies when Manifested.
The more Sword Stones you have, the more damage skill attacks deal. Applies after obtaining all of Aisha's skills.
Gain Attack after shifting to Aisha.
Shifting to Aisha takes less time.
Attack to cancel the delay after shifting.
Skills triggered while Manifested gain a Manifestation Effect.
You can perform a basic attack to cancel the delay after using an attack skill.
You can move or perform an attack to cancel the delay after dashing.
Increase power of basic attacks the higher your Affinity. Always applies when Aisha is in the party.
Affinity falls more slowly. Always applies when Aisha is in the party.
Increase Affinity after Manifestation ends. Always applies when Aisha is in the party.
Increase healing the higher your Affinity. Always applies when Aisha is in the party.

Critical hits increase Affinity.
Critical hits decrease the cooldown of the triggering attack.
Critical hits increase Attack.
Critical hits increase Defense.
When a skill attack hits, immediately press the button again to increase its power.
When a skill attack hits, immediately press the button again to increase its critical hit chance.
When a skill attack hits, immediately press the button again to cause it to pierce Defense.
You can no longer be Staggered when hit by attacks from the front.
Evade for longer while jumping.
Gain critical power when you use Healing Incense.
Gain critical hit chance with higher Affinity.
Decrease damage taken from the front with higher Affinity.
Increases effect of buffs and debuffs when Affinity is over 150. This affects the requirements for critical hits.
Chance to reflect attacks if not Staggered when Affinity is over 150.
Increase critical power when an attack hits. Only applies when Manifested. Can stack.
Increase critical power. Only applies when Manifested.
When a skill attack hits, immediately press the button again to increase its power. Only applies when Manifested.
Decrease the Attack of enemies. Only applies when Manifested.
When you Manifest, remove all debuffs and damage nearby enemies.
The more Spear Stones you have, the more damage skill attacks deal. Applies after obtaining all of Zaav's skills.
Gain Attack after shifting to Zaav.
Shifting to Zaav takes less time.
Attack to cancel the delay after shifting.
Skills triggered while Manifested gain a Manifestation Effect.
You can perform a basic attack to cancel the delay after using an attack skill.
Increase power of jump attacks. You can change the direction of jump attacks mid-air.
Increase critical power. Always applies when Zaav is in the party.
Increase Defense when your Affinity is over 150. Always applies when Zaav is in the party.
Restore the Manifest Gauge when a critical hit occurs while Manifested. Always applies when Zaav is in the party.
Reduce the remaining duration of debuffs when you use Healing Incense. Always applies when Zaav is in the party.

Charge attack skills by holding down the button. Release to trigger. The longer the charge, the more powerful the attack.
Gain Attack by charging to full. Can stack.
You can no longer be Staggered by enemy attacks while charging.
Increase Affinity by charging to full.
Increase power of attacks by charging to full.
Increase critical power of fully charged attacks.
Gain Attack the lower your HP.
Gain Defense the lower your HP.
You cannot be Incapacitated while Defending.
Gain Attack when you use Healing Incense.
Higher Affinity increases Attack.
Higher Affinity reduces the damage taken while Defending.
Increase critical hit chance when Affinity is over 150.
Increase the power of your next attack based on current damage taken when Affinity is over 150.
Increase max HP. Only applies when Manifested.
Decrease the time required to fully charge a skill. Only applies when Manifested.
Increase the effect of Fully charged skills. Only applies when Manifested.
Become much harder to overwhelm while Defending. Only applies when Manifested.
Remain at 1 HP the first time you take enough damage to be Incapacitated. Only applies when Manifested.
The more Axe Stones you have, the more damage skill attacks deal. Applies after obtaining all of Wil's skills.
Gain Attack after shifting to Wil.
Shifting to Wil takes less time.
Attack to cancel the delay after shifting.
Skills triggered while Manifested gain a Manifestation Effect.
You can perform a basic attack to cancel the delay after using an attack skill.
You can move or perform an attack to cancel the delay after Defending.
Chance to Stagger when attacks hit. Always applies when Wil is in the party.
Chance to decrease Defense when attacks hit. Always applies when Wil is in the party.
Increase Attack. Only applies when Manifested and Wil is in the party.
Increase healing the lower your HP. Always applies when Wil is in the party.

Increase the Affinity gained when a side or rear attack hits.

Increase critical power when a rear attack hits. Can stack.

Increase buff and debuff duration when rear attacks hit. Only applies when Manifested.
Increase critical hit chance based on the number of active buffs and debuffs. Only applies when Manifested.

Shifting to Izana takes less time.

Move or perform an attack to cancel the delay after a warp.
Chance to recover HP when attacks hit. Always applies when Izana is in the party.
Restore the Manifest Gauge when you defeat an enemy when Manifested. Always applies when Izana is in the party.
Increase Attack based on the number of active buffs and debuffs. Only applies when Manifested and Izana is in the party.
Restore the Manifest Gauge when you use Healing Incense when Manifested. Triggers once per Manifestation. Always applies when Izana is in the party.

Prepare to counter attacks by holding the button when using a skill. Countering increases cooldown.
Countering an attack reduces cooldown.
Chance to become invulnerable when hitting an enemy taking an action.
Attacks that hit enemies taking an action have increased critical hit chance.
Attacks that hit enemies taking an action have increased debuff chance.
Increase attack power when countering.
The longer you haven't taken damage, the quicker you gain Affinity.
Increase duration of rolling evasion.
Become able to roll when hit by any attacks except those that knock you into the air.
Become invulnerable when you use Healing Incense.
Increase the power of attacks that hit enemies taking an action the higher your Affinity.
Increase reflected damage dealt the higher your Affinity.
Increase Attack when your Affinity is over 150.
Consume three Healing Incense and fully heal if Incapacitated while Affinity is over 150.
Take 0 damage when countering. Only applies when Manifested.
Increase the effect of attacks that hit enemies taking an action. Only applies when Manifested.
Increase reflected damage dealt. Only applies when Manifested.
Gain more Attack the longer you haven't taken damage. Only applies when Manifested.

Enable lock on. Hold down the button and use <ICON=BUTTON_MOVE> to target when using a skill. Locking on gives a variety of bonuses.

Enable lock on. Hold down the button and use <ICON=BUTTON_MOVE_UP><ICON=BUTTON_MOVE_LEFT><ICON=BUTTON_MOVE_DOWN><ICON=BUTTON_MOVE_RIGHT> to target when using a skill. Locking on gives a variety of bonuses.
Attacks that hit locked on enemies increase Affinity.
You cannot be Staggered when hit by locked on enemies.
Attacks that hit locked on enemies are more likely to Stagger.
Attacks that hit locked on enemies have increased critical hit chance.
Attacks that hit locked on enemies have a chance to decrease Defense.
Increase the power of attacks the farther the enemy is when hit.
Reflect debuff attacks you have 100 resistance to.
Increase power of basic attacks and attacks made while jumping.
Increase resistance to debuffs when you use Healing Incense.
Increase the power of attacks that hit locked on enemies the higher your Affinity.
Increase resistance to debuffs the higher your Affinity.
Attacks that hit locked on enemies have a chance to decrease Attack when Affinity is over 150.
Increase Defense while attacking when Affinity is over 150.
Increase the effect of attacks that hit locked on enemies. Only applies when Manifested.
Attacks that hit locked on enemies increase Attack. Only applies when Manifested. Can stack.
Increase critical hit chance the farther the enemy is when hit. Only applies when Manifested.
Attacks pierce enemy Defense. Only applies when Manifested.
Decrease the movement speed of enemies. Only applies when Manifested.
The more Farshot Stones you have, the more damage skill attacks deal. Applies after obtaining all of Dia's skills.
Gain Attack after shifting to Dia.
Shifting to Dia takes less time.
Attack to cancel the delay after shifting.
Skills triggered while Manifested gain a Manifestation Effect.
Perform a basic attack to cancel the delay after using an attack skill.
Increase power of glide attacks. You can change the direction of glide attacks mid-air.
Shots pierce. Always applies when Dia is in the party.
Gain HP when hit with debuff attacks you have 100 resistance to. Always applies when Dia is in the party.
Increase resistance to debuffs. Only applies when Manifested and Dia is in the party.
You can use Healing Incense even while debuffed. Always applies when Dia is in the party.

Increase movement speed while shield is raised.
Increase Affinity when attacked while shield is raised.
Perform knock back attacks when raising shield.
Increase the power of attacks made immediately after lowering shield.
Increase melee attack power, enabling you to overwhelm Defending enemies.
Projectile attacks pierce Defense.
Increase the power of melee attacks based on your HP.
Increase the critical hit chance of projectile attacks based on your HP.
Passively regenerate.
Increase Defense when you use Healing Incense.
Increase the damage of attacks made while shield is raised. The higher your Affinity, the greater the effect.
Higher Affinity increases Defense.
Increase movement speed when Affinity is over 150.
Unaffected by debuffs while shield is raised when Affinity is over 150.
Take 0 damage while shield is raised. Only applies when Manifested.
Reflect attacks taken while shield is raised. Only applies when Manifested.
Gain Attack when attacked while shield is raised. Only applies when Manifested. Can stack.
Decrease movement speed of enemies hit with melee attacks. Only applies when Manifested.
Increase the power of projectile attacks. Only applies when Manifested.
The more Shieldcannon Stones you have, the more damage skill attacks deal. Applies after obtaining all of Gavod's skills.
Gain Attack after shifting to Gavod.
Shifting to Gavod takes less time.
Attack to cancel the delay after shifting.
Skills triggered while Manifested gain a Manifestation Effect.
Perform a basic attack to cancel the delay after using an attack skill.
You can move or perform an attack to cancel the delay after raising your shield.
Chance to negate incoming attacks. Always applies when Gavod is in the party.
The more attacks taken since your last attack, the greater the power of your next attack. Always applies when Gavod is in the party.
Increase Defense. Only applies when Manifested and Gavod is in the party.
Reduce cooldown when you use Healing Incense. Always applies when Gavod is in the party.

Spawn devices through consecutive skill triggers. You can spawn up to four devices, with the furthest away fading first.
Cooldown decreases with consecutive skill triggers.
Increase the power of attacks based on the number of consecutive skill triggers.
You can spawn up to eight devices.
Extend the duration and range before devices fade.
Increase the power of critical hits based on the number of devices spawned.
The more devices spawned, the harder it is to be Staggered while attacking.
The more devices spawned, the greater the power of your attacks.
Increase Awakening duration.
Your Affinity can no longer decrease when you use Healing Incense.
Pierce Defense and deal damage the higher your Affinity.
Decrease damage taken while attacking the higher your Affinity.
Increase chance of Awakenings the more consecutive attacks you deal when Affinity is over 150.
The more devices spawned, the less damage you take within the barrier when Affinity is over 150.
The number of devices spawned is treated as higher than the current level. Only applies when Manifested.
The more devices spawned, the higher your critical hit chance. Only applies when Manifested.
The more devices spawned, the lower your enemies' Defense. Only applies when Manifested.
Reduce cooldowns. Only applies when Manifested.
Increase all stats within the barrier. Only applies when Manifested.

Gain Attack after shifting to Lucika.
Shifting to Lucika takes less time.
Attack to cancel the delay after shifting.
Skills triggered while Manifested gain a Manifestation Effect.
Perform a basic attack to cancel the delay after using an attack skill.
You can take actions after raising a barrier.
Increase the power of attacks that trigger consecutive skills.
Increase the power of Manifested and Awakening attacks. Always applies when Lucika is in the party.
Increase the chance of Awakening. Only applies when Manifested and Lucika is in the party.
Damage nearby enemies when you use Healing Incense. Always applies when Lucika is in the party.
